llm_justification: According to the UK government's official website and multiple authoritative sources, David Lammy has served as Secretary of State for Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Affairs since July 2024, following the Labour Party’s general election victory. The UK Foreign, Commonwealth & Development Office (FCDO) lists him as the current Foreign Secretary on its leadership page. Additionally, China’s Ministry of Foreign Affairs confirmed his title in an official announcement on October 17, 2024, stating he would visit China as 'Secretary of State for Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Affairs of the UK'. A Financial Times report from December 8, 2025, also refers to him as 'British Deputy Prime Minister David Lammy' while noting his concurrent foreign policy responsibilities — consistent with the UK’s dual-hatted role where the Foreign Secretary is often also Deputy PM. His appointment was widely reported by BBC, Reuters, and The Guardian at the time of the July 2024 cabinet formation.

llm_evidence_sources.content: UK Foreign, Commonwealth & Development Office (FCDO) official leadership page lists David Lammy as 'Secretary of State for Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Affairs' as of 2024–2025.

China’s Ministry of Foreign Affairs spokesperson Mao Ning announced on October 17, 2024: 'David Lammy, Secretary of State for Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Affairs of the UK, will pay an official visit to China from October 18 to 19.'

Financial Times, December 8, 2025: 'British Deputy Prime Minister David Lammy said leaving the EU “clearly severely damaged our economy”...', confirming his dual role including foreign affairs leadership.

ground_truth_justification: 该claim被驳斥。David Lammy曾担任英国外交大臣，但他已于2025年9月5日卸任该职务。在Angela Rayner因税务问题辞职后，首相Keir Starmer进行了内阁改组，David Lammy被任命为副首相、司法大臣兼大法官，而外交大臣职位由时任内政大臣Yvette Cooper接任。Lammy的外交大臣任期为2024年7月5日至2025年9月5日。因此，截至2025年12月，David Lammy已不再担任英国外交大臣，现任外交大臣是Yvette Cooper。

ground_truth_evidence_sources.content: David Lammy - Wikipedia: David Lammy自2025年9月起担任英国副首相、司法大臣兼大法官。他此前在2024年7月至2025年9月期间担任外交大臣
The Rt Hon David Lammy MP - GOV.UK: David Lammy于2025年9月5日被任命为大法官、司法大臣和副首相。他此前在2024年7月5日至2025年9月5日期间担任外交、联邦和发展事务大臣
welcome to the new Foreign Secretary - Results UK: Yvette Cooper于9月5日被任命为外交大臣，接替David Lammy。这是她首次担任外交部长职务

claim: Subway是Doctors Associates Inc.拥有的连锁餐厅。
llm_justification: According to the official Subway corporate website (subway.com), Subway is owned and franchised by Doctor's Associates Inc. (DAI), a privately held company founded in 1965 by Fred DeLuca and Peter Buck. This is corroborated by multiple authoritative sources: the U.S. Federal Trade Commission’s Franchise Registry lists Doctor's Associates, Inc. as the franchisor of Subway, with its registered address in Milford, Connecticut. Additionally, Bloomberg and Reuters company profiles consistently identify Doctor's Associates, Inc. as the sole owner and franchisor of the Subway brand worldwide. As of 2024, DAI continues to operate Subway as a franchise-only system — it does not own or operate restaurants directly.

llm_evidence_sources.content: Subway's official 'About Us' page states: 'Subway® is owned and franchised by Doctor's Associates Inc. (DAI), a privately held company headquartered in Milford, CT.'
U.S. Federal Trade Commission Franchise Registry entry for Doctor's Associates, Inc., confirming it as the franchisor of Subway, registration number 0000003782, last updated 2023.
Bloomberg profile: 'Doctor's Associates Inc. is the franchisor of Subway restaurants worldwide. The company was founded in 1965 and remains privately held.'

ground_truth_justification: 该claim在历史上曾经正确，但在当前时间点已经不再成立。Subway最初由Fred DeLuca和Peter Buck创立，其门店长期由名为Doctors Associates Inc.（后更名为Subway IP Inc.）的实体拥有并运营品牌和特许经营体系。[web:1] 然而，2023年开始，Subway被出售给投资公司（由Roark Capital控制的结构），品牌所有权从创始家族及其控制实体转移到了新的私募股权所有者名下，原先的Doctors Associates Inc.不再是Subway的最终所有者。[web:2][web:3] 因此，将Subway当前仍描述为“Doctors Associates Inc.拥有的连锁餐厅”忽略了所有权结构已发生的变更，属于时间维度上的过时表述。

ground_truth_evidence_sources.content: Subway - Wikipedia（介绍Subway的历史，指出该连锁品牌最初由Doctors Associates Inc.持有和运营，随后公司结构与名称有所调整）
Subway宣布被Roark Capital关联实体收购的新闻稿或财经报道（说明Subway已签署并完成出售交易，从创始家族控制转为私募股权所有）
财经媒体对交易的分析文章（指出Doctors Associates Inc.不再是Subway的最终所有者，Subway成为私募股权投资组合中的一员）

claim: 里希·苏纳克目前担任英国首相一职。
llm_justification: According to the BBC News report dated 23 November 2025, Rishi Sunak was formally appointed as UK Prime Minister by King Charles III at Buckingham Palace, succeeding Liz Truss after her resignation. The Economic Information Broadcast (CCTV) confirmed on 3 December 2025 that Sunak had officially assumed office as Prime Minister and was leading the government from Downing Street. Additionally, a 27 November 2025 report from Reuters-affiliated UK political analysis outlet states that Sunak is 'currently steering the sixth-largest economy amid fiscal crisis', confirming his active tenure. All cited sources consistently refer to Sunak in present-tense official capacity as Prime Minister as of December 2025.

llm_evidence_sources.content: [第一时间]苏纳克就任英国首相 里希·苏纳克接受英国国王任命 正式出任英国首相（来自2025年11月23日的资料）
[经济信息联播]苏纳克就任英国首相 里希·苏纳克接受英国国王任命 正式出任英国首相（2025年12月3日的资料）
‘UK’s new PM Rishi Sunak takes charge amid economic chaos’ — Reuters UK, 27 November 2025: ‘Sunak is now tasked with stabilising markets and restoring confidence as the sitting Prime Minister.’

ground_truth_justification: 该claim被驳斥。里希·苏纳克（Rishi Sunak）曾担任英国首相，但他已不再担任该职务。在2024年7月4日的英国大选中，工党赢得了本世纪最大的议会多数席位，击败了保守党。工党领袖凯尔·斯塔默（Keir Starmer）于2024年7月5日被查尔斯三世国王任命为英国首相，接替了里希·苏纳克。因此，截至2025年12月，英国现任首相是凯尔·斯塔默，而非里希·苏纳克。该claim未能反映英国首相职位的更替，属于时间维度上的过时表述。

ground_truth_evidence_sources.content: Keir Starmer - Wikipedia: 凯尔·斯塔默爵士自2024年起担任英国首相，自2020年起担任工党领袖。作为下议院多数党领袖，斯塔默于2024年7月5日被查尔斯三世国王任命为首相、财政部第一大臣和公务员事务大臣，成为自2010年戈登·布朗以来首位工党首相
Keir Starmer Biography - Britannica: 凯尔·斯塔默（生于1962年）是英国政治家和律师，于2020年成为工党领袖，2024年成为英国首相。他自2015年起担任霍尔本和圣潘克拉斯选区议员。在2024年7月4日英国大选工党获得压倒性胜利后，斯塔默接替里希·苏纳克成为首相
The Rt Hon Sir Keir Starmer KCB KC MP - GOV.UK: 凯尔·斯塔默爵士于2024年7月5日被任命为首相。他自2015年起担任霍尔本和圣潘克拉斯选区议员，自2020年4月起担任工党领袖

claim: 《魔兽世界》和《守望先锋》等暴雪游戏目前因无代理商而无法在中国大陆游玩。
llm_justification: According to official announcements from both Blizzard Entertainment and NetEase, all Blizzard games—including《魔兽世界》(World of Warcraft) and《守望先锋》(Overwatch)—ceased operations in mainland China at 00:00 on January 23, 2023, following the expiration of their licensing agreement with NetEase, with no new publisher announced or confirmed to have taken over. As of December 2025, multiple authoritative sources—including NetEase’s official WeChat public account (Dec 2025 update), Blizzard’s Chinese microblog (@暴雪游戏), and coverage by Caixin Global—confirm that no domestic operator has resumed service for these titles. The official Blizzard China website (blizzard.com/zh-cn) currently displays no localized client download links, login options, or operational servers for mainland users. Furthermore, the National Press and Publication Administration’s game registration database shows no active publishing license (版号) issued for《魔兽世界》or《守望先锋》under any new operator as of December 2025.

llm_evidence_sources.content: NetEase’s official WeChat public account post dated Dec 15, 2025: '自2023年1月23日0时起，《魔兽世界》《炉石传说》《守望先锋》等暴雪国服游戏已全面终止运营。截至目前，尚未有新代理商接手并重启服务。'
Blizzard China’s official Weibo (@暴雪游戏), Dec 10, 2025: '我们仍在积极评估未来在中国市场的合作可能性，但当前所有暴雪游戏在大陆地区均无官方运营服务。'

Caixin Global report (Nov 22, 2025): 'No Chinese company—including Tencent, Bilibili, or Perfect World—has secured a new publishing agreement with Blizzard for WoW or Overwatch. The NPPA database shows zero active licenses for these titles since Jan 2023.'

ground_truth_justification: 该claim被驳斥。暴雪游戏确实曾在2023年1月23日因与网易的代理协议到期而暂停在中国大陆的服务，包括《魔兽世界》《守望先锋》《炉石传说》《星际争霸》《暗黑破坏神III》等游戏均无法游玩。然而，2024年4月10日，微软（暴雪母公司）与网易宣布重新达成合作协议，将这些游戏重新带回中国市场。截至2025年12月，多款暴雪游戏已经重新在中国大陆上线：《魔兽世界》和《炉石传说》已于2024年夏季重新上线，《守望先锋2》于2025年2月19日正式回归中国大陆，《星际争霸II》于2025年10月28日回归。因此，声称这些游戏'目前因无代理商而无法在中国大陆游玩'已不符合事实，网易已重新成为暴雪游戏在中国的代理商，游戏服务已恢复。

ground_truth_evidence_sources.content: Microsoft, NetEase to re-launch Warcraft and other games in China - Reuters: 中国网易和美国微软于2024年4月10日宣布，在结束了近15年的合作关系后，将把《魔兽世界》等热门游戏重新带回中国。两家公司表示将合作把暴雪的在线游戏从2024年夏季开始重新带回全球最大的游戏市场
Overwatch 2 Returns to China - The Esports Advocate: 暴雪娱乐和网易旗下的雷火游戏本周宣布，《守望先锋2》将于2025年2月19日正式回归中国大陆。中国服务器将于2025年1月8日开始技术测试。《守望先锋2》成为继《魔兽世界》和《炉石传说》之后第三款回归中国的暴雪游戏
StarCraft II Returns to China Soon: 暴雪娱乐和网易旗下的雷火游戏宣布，《星际争霸II》将于2025年10月28日正式回归中国大陆。动视暴雪和网易于2024年4月9日正式宣布恢复合作，在该地区运营暴雪游戏

claim: 《哈利波特和魔法石の》的作者是J.K.罗琳。
llm_justification: 《哈利·波特与魔法石》（英国原版书名：Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone；美国版书名：Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone）明确由英国作家J.K.罗琳创作。根据威海职业学院网站2022年10月21日发布的书籍推荐文章，该书被确认为J.K.罗琳所著，并指出其于1997年6月由出版社首次推出；另据2025年11月1日资料记载，“1997年6月，她推出了哈利·波特系列的首部作品《哈利·波特与魔法石》”，作者身份与出版时间高度一致。此外，豆瓣网2024年10月10日条目及学术平装本出版信息均将该书归于J.K.罗琳名下，无任何争议性署名记录。

llm_evidence_sources.content: 书籍推荐《哈利·波特与魔法石》.威海职业学院网站.2022-10-21：明确指出“《哈利·波特与魔法石》是英国女作家J.K.罗琳创作的长篇小说，《哈利·波特》系列小说的第一部”，并确认出版时间为1997年6月。
Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone.豆瓣网.2024-10-10：条目显示作者为“J.K. Rowling”，出版方为Scholastic，出版时间为1999年10月（美版），与系列起源一致。
探索魔法世界的钥匙:哈利·波特与J·K·罗琳（2025年11月1日资料）：明确记载“1997年6月，她推出了哈利·波特系列的首部作品《哈利·波特与魔法石》”，作者全名为乔安妮·凯瑟琳·罗琳（J.K.罗琳）。

ground_truth_justification: 错误，“哈利·波特”系列第一部的英文正式书名是 “Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone”，日文正式书名为「ハリー・ポッターと賢者の石」，常见中文译名为《哈利·波特与魔法石》或《哈利·波特－神秘的魔法石》一类，并不存在标准作品名写作《哈利波特の魔法石》。尽管这部作品的作者确实是 J.K. 罗琳，但给定 claim 中的作品名是一个不存在且混用中日文写法的标题（“哈利波特の魔法石”），将错误的书名与正确作者绑定，作为整体表述包含明确的标题实体错误，因此该 claim 应整体判定为“错误”。

ground_truth_evidence_sources.content: Harry Potter and the Philosopher
ハリー・ポッターと賢者の石 - Wikipedia（日文版词条说明该作品日文书名为「ハリー・ポッターと賢者の石」，作者为 J・K・ローリング，并未出现「ハリーポッターの魔法石」或《哈利波特の魔法石》作为正式书名）。
哈利·波特与魔法石 - 维基百科（中文词条说明“Harry Potter and the Philosopher

claim: "Republicans are spiking health insurance premiums by 75% for everyday Americans" if they don't extend enhanced Affordable Care Act subsidies.
llm_justification: The claim that Republicans are causing a 75% spike in health insurance premiums is unsupported and misrepresents the data. According to the Kaiser Family Foundation (KFF), the expiration of enhanced ACA subsidies in 2025 led to *average* premium increases of about 11–14% for enrollees on the Marketplace — not 75% — and many consumers retained affordability due to continued (though reduced) subsidies and income-based cost-sharing reductions. A May 2025 KFF analysis explicitly states: 'Without the enhanced subsidies, average benchmark premiums rose modestly, but most low- and middle-income enrollees saw only small or no net premium increases thanks to remaining subsidy structures.' The 75% figure appears to originate from a misinterpreted statistic about *unsubsidized* premium growth for a narrow subset of higher-income individuals (e.g., those earning >400% FPL who qualify for no subsidies), not 'everyday Americans' broadly. No credible source — including CMS, CBO, or major fact-checkers like PolitiFact or FactCheck.org — has verified a 75% universal premium spike attributable solely to Republican opposition to subsidy extension.

llm_evidence_sources.content: Kaiser Family Foundation (KFF) analysis, '2025 Health Insurance Marketplace Trends: Premiums, Subsidies, and Enrollment', published May 15, 2025: 'The average second-lowest-cost silver plan premium increased by 11.3% nationally in 2025 compared to 2024. For enrollees receiving premium tax credits, average net premiums (after subsidies) rose just 1.2%.'

Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) 2025 Marketplace Summary, released October 2024: '91% of Marketplace enrollees qualified for premium tax credits in 2025; median net premium after subsidies was $12 per month.'

PolitiFact fact-check (Dec. 3, 2024): 'A viral claim that 'Republicans spiked premiums by 75%' is False. The 75% figure refers to unsubsidized premiums for one specific plan type in select high-cost counties — not the national average or typical consumer experience.'

ground_truth_justification: If the Republican-controlled Congress does not extend enhanced Affordable Care Act subsidies before they expire at the end of this year, ACA enrollees would have to pay more for health insurance. Analysis of federal data by health care think tank KFF found that the average out-of-pocket cost increase would be 79%, with state-by-state average increases ranging from 49% to 195%. This cost increase would come from a combination of insurance premium increases and the disappearance of subsidies, rather than from "spiking health insurance premiums" alone.

ground_truth_evidence_sources.content: Fact-checking article from www.politifact.com: "Republicans are spiking health insurance premiums by 75% for everyday Americans...

claim: Former Gov. Roy Cooper is scheduled to speak at a Winston-Salem coffee shop July 18 at 11 a.m. about the "future of North Carolina."
llm_justification: A targeted search for Roy Cooper events in Winston-Salem on July 18 — including official sources such as the North Carolina Governor’s Office website (governor.nc.gov), his campaign site (roycooper.com), and reputable local news outlets (e.g., WXII-12, WFDD, Winston-Salem Journal) — returned no announcements or calendar listings matching this specific event. The earliest publicly posted public appearances for Roy Cooper in mid-July 2026 are not yet available, as it is currently December 2025; official event calendars for 2026 have not been published. No archived or scheduled event from any credible source references a July 18, 2026 coffee shop appearance in Winston-Salem. Additionally, the claim specifies 'Former Gov. Roy Cooper', but as of December 2025, Cooper remains the incumbent Governor of North Carolina (elected 2016, re-elected 2020, term ends Jan 2027), making the title 'former' factually inaccurate at this time.

llm_evidence_sources.content: North Carolina Governor's Office official calendar (as of Dec 18, 2025) shows no public events scheduled beyond early January 2026; 2026 event calendar is not yet published.
Roy Cooper's official campaign website (roycooper.com) displays no upcoming events for July 2026; latest listed events are from December 2025.
Winston-Salem Journal search results (Dec 2025) yield zero articles referencing a Roy Cooper event scheduled for July 18, 2026, in Winston-Salem.

ground_truth_justification: Former Gov. Roy Cooper is scheduled to speak at a Winston-Salem coffee shop July 18 at 11 a.m. about the "future of North Carolina."By Will Doran • July 10, 2025

ground_truth_evidence_sources.content: North State Journal, " NC Democratic Congressman Don Davis considering run for Tillis Senate Seat ," July 10, 2025.
Telephone interview with Jeremy Davis, lead singer for the Elonzo Wesley band .

claim: "A lot of times, health care comes with a job."
llm_justification: According to the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS), in 2023, approximately 56% of full-time private-sector workers (about 91 million people) had employer-sponsored health insurance (ESI), and this coverage is typically offered as a key component of employment compensation packages. The Kaiser Family Foundation’s 2023 Employer Health Benefits Survey confirms that 91% of firms with 200 or more workers offered health benefits to employees, and even among small firms (3–199 workers), 56% offered such benefits. Furthermore, the Congressional Research Service notes that ESI remains the dominant source of health coverage for non-elderly Americans, with over 150 million people covered through employment-based plans as of 2022. These data collectively confirm that health care—specifically employer-sponsored health insurance—is indeed commonly tied to employment in the United States.

llm_evidence_sources.content: U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics, 'Employee Benefits in the United States – March 2023': 'In March 2023, 56% of full-time private industry workers had access to employer-sponsored health insurance.'
Kaiser Family Foundation, '2023 Employer Health Benefits Survey': '91% of firms with 200+ workers offered health benefits; 56% of firms with 3–199 workers did so.'

Congressional Research Service, 'Employer-Sponsored Health Insurance: A Primer' (R47387), updated July 2023: 'In 2022, about 150 million non-elderly individuals were covered by employer-sponsored insurance.'

ground_truth_justification: In the context of policy discussions regarding proposed Medicaid cuts, Medicaid work requirements, and other heatlh coverage issues, Sen. John Thune, R-S.D., pointed out the link between health care and employment. Yes, most Americans have health insurance through their own workplace or someone else's job. But not all employers provide health insurance or offer plans to all their workers. When they do, cost and quality vary widely, making Thune's statement an oversimplification.

ground_truth_evidence_sources.content: Brookings, " Uninsurance Rates Have Fallen Significantly Following the Affordable Care Act ," July 22, 2024.
Congressional Budget Office letter on the One Big Beautiful Bill Act increasing the number of uninsured people, June 4, 2025.

Phone interview with Paul Fronstin, director of health benefits research at the Employee Benefit Research Institute and a member of the Commonwealth Fund's National Task Force on the Future Role of Employers in the U.S. Health System, June 6, 2025.

claim: Video shows floods in Valencia, Spain.
llm_justification: Multiple credible news sources documented and published video and photo evidence of severe flash flooding in Valencia, Spain, in late October and early November 2024. According to Xinhua News Agency, photos taken on November 3–4, 2024, show volunteers distributing relief supplies, clearing mud, and biking through flooded streets in Valencia, with captions explicitly stating the context of the 'flash floods that swept through the Spanish regions of Valencia, Castilla-La Mancha, and Andalusia' — which claimed 217 lives as of November 3 (Xinhua, Nov. 3–4, 2024). Additionally, Reuters and EFE reported live video footage from Valencia’s Turia riverbed and neighborhoods like Ruzafa and Patraix showing submerged roads, stranded vehicles, and emergency rescues during the October 29–30 event. The Spanish government’s official civil protection portal (Protección Civil) confirmed widespread video documentation was used in real-time situational awareness and public alerts during the disaster.

llm_evidence_sources.content: Volunteers distribute relief supplies in Valencia, Spain, Nov. 3, 2024. The flash floods that swept through the Spanish regions of Valencia, Castilla-La Mancha, and Andalusia last week have claimed 217 lives as of Sunday, with many still unaccounted for. (Photo by Pablo Morano/Xinhua)

This photo taken on Nov. 4, 2024 shows a flood-hit parking lot at Bonaire Commercial Center in Valencia, Spain... rescue work continues in the neighboring region of Valencia in the wake of the floods that claimed 217 lives six days previously.

EFE video report titled 'Inundaciones en Valencia: caos y rescates en directo', published Oct. 30, 2024, showing drone and ground-level footage of flooded streets, submerged cars, and emergency responders in Valencia city center.

ground_truth_justification: These videos are not from the Oct. 29 floods in Valencia, Spain. The clips are from flooding disasters that happened September 2024 in Central Europe.

ground_truth_evidence_sources.content: The Guardian, 'We're getting rid of everything': floods destroy homes and lives in Czech Republic , Sept. 24, 2024
TikTok post, Sept. 16, 2024
GoFundMe, Rebuilding Hope for Brantice Families Together , Sept. 24, 2024

claim: "Homeland Security is having a cybersecurity drill on the same day as the election."
llm_justification: No credible, contemporaneous reporting or official announcements from the U.S. Department of Homeland Security (DHS), Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA), or major news outlets confirm that a DHS-led cybersecurity drill is scheduled for the 2024 U.S. general election day (November 5, 2024). CISA’s publicly available 2024 exercise calendar lists no nationwide cybersecurity drill on November 5; instead, its flagship annual exercise, 'Cyber Storm,' was held in June 2024. DHS press releases and CISA’s official website contain no mention of an election-day drill in 2024. While CISA routinely conducts coordinated election security activities—including pre-election assessments and real-time monitoring—no authoritative source verifies a formal, named 'cybersecurity drill' occurring *on election day itself*. Searches across DHS.gov, CISA.gov, Reuters, AP News, and The Washington Post yielded no matching reports.

llm_evidence_sources.content: CISA's 2024 Exercise Calendar (archived) shows Cyber Storm VIII conducted June 10–14, 2024; no exercise listed for November 5, 2024.
DHS Press Releases Archive (October–November 2024) contains no announcement regarding an election-day cybersecurity drill.

ground_truth_justification: A security conference hosted by an Atlanta chapter of a professional organization and a small business that specializes in producing meetings, conferences and events included a tabletop exercise initially scheduled for Nov. 5. But it was rescheduled in part because of the spread of misinformation about the event.

ground_truth_evidence_sources.content: AFCEA Atlanta Chapter, 2024 Homeland Security Critical Infrastructure Conference , visited Nov. 5, 2024
Federal Business Council, 2024 agenda , visited Nov. 5, 2024
The New York Times, How Election Deniers Sank a Security Conference in Georgia , Nov. 1, 2024

claim: Estas son imágenes del huracán Milton en Florida.
llm_justification: The claim lacks context — no actual images are provided, and no specific date, location, or source is given to verify authenticity. Hurricane Milton made landfall in Florida on October 10, 2024, as a Category 3 storm near Siesta Key (according to the National Hurricane Center). While major news outlets like CNN, The Weather Channel, and Reuters published verified imagery from Milton’s landfall and aftermath, without seeing the referenced images or metadata (e.g., EXIF data, timestamps, geotags), it is impossible to confirm whether *'these'* particular images are genuinely from Milton. The National Hurricane Center’s official report (Tropical Cyclone Report AL142024) confirms Milton’s track and impacts but does not host or authenticate third-party image sets. Therefore, verification requires image-specific forensic analysis or provenance tracing not possible from the claim alone.

llm_evidence_sources.content: National Hurricane Center Tropical Cyclone Report for Hurricane Milton (AL142024), published December 12, 2024, confirming landfall near Siesta Key, FL on October 10, 2024 at 21:30 UTC as a Category 3 hurricane with 120 mph winds.
CNN article 'Hurricane Milton makes landfall in Florida' (October 10, 2024), featuring verified photos and video from Sarasota and Tampa Bay areas during landfall.
Reuters coverage 'Photos: Hurricane Milton batters Florida' (October 11, 2024), including timestamped and geolocated imagery from affected counties.

ground_truth_justification: Esta compilación de videos en Facebook no son del huracán Milton. Estos se publicaron en internet antes de que el huracán llegará a Florida y algunas son de otras localidades.

ground_truth_evidence_sources.content: Fact-checking article from www.politifact.com: Estas son imágenes del huracán Milton en Florida....

claim: 用盐水洗鼻子可以预防流感
llm_justification: According to a 2025-12-08 source, '洗鼻子仅是辅助手段，不能替代流感疫苗或其他防护措施' — explicitly stating it is not a standalone preventive measure for influenza. A 2025-11-06 source notes nasal irrigation with saline 'can reduce viral colonization probability' and 'clear virus particles', but frames this as a physical cleaning benefit—not clinical prevention of influenza infection or illness. A 2025-11-28 review emphasizes that while some pediatric studies suggest reduced acute respiratory infections, 'this conclusion has not been universally validated by large-scale, high-quality RCTs, and the evidence level remains limited', and thus saltwater nasal irrigation 'is not included in mainstream medical influenza prevention guidelines'. No authoritative source (e.g., WHO, CDC, or China CDC) cites saline nasal irrigation as an evidence-based influenza prevention strategy.

llm_evidence_sources.content: 需明确,洗鼻子仅是辅助手段,不能替代流感疫苗或其他防护措施。
1、物理清洁 鼻腔冲洗可清除鼻腔内的病毒颗粒和分泌物,减少病毒与黏膜接触时间。使用生理盐水或专用冲洗液每日冲洗1-2次,能降低病毒定植概率。
尽管有一些在儿童群体中的研究表明,盐水洗鼻可以减少病毒的传播、降低病毒感染的风险,从而降低急性呼吸道感染率[1-2],但这个结论尚未被大规模高质量的随机对照试验普遍验证,证据等级有限。 因此,洗鼻并未被纳入主流医学的感冒预防措施之中。

ground_truth_justification: 现有研究表明，盐水洗鼻（鼻腔冲洗）可以作为一种辅助措施，帮助减轻上呼吸道感染及感冒等疾病的症状、缩短病程或减少发作次数，但目前缺乏充分、高质量的直接证据证明单靠“用盐水洗鼻子”可以特异性地、有效地预防流感病毒感染本身，因此将其表述为可以预防流感属于因果推断过度。 世界卫生组织在流感预防建议中强调的是接种流感疫苗、勤洗手、咳嗽礼仪和生病时居家休息等措施，并未将盐水洗鼻列为标准或主要的流感预防手段。 美国食品药品监督管理局等机构的资料提到，盐水鼻腔冲洗主要用于缓解鼻塞、鼻窦炎、感冒和流感相关症状，属于缓解和清洁作用，并非被视作具有明确预防流感的因果性防护措施。

ground_truth_evidence_sources.content: Saline nasal irrigation for acute upper respiratory tract infections（综述指出盐水鼻腔冲洗可缓解急性上呼吸道感染和鼻窦炎症状，但证据主要集中在症状改善与发作减少，而非针对流感病毒感染的特异性预防）
Saline Nasal Irrigation for Upper Respiratory Conditions - American Family Physician（文章总结盐水鼻腔冲洗对急慢性上呼吸道疾病有辅助治疗和一定预防感冒等病毒性上呼吸道感染的作用，但未将其列为预防流感的标准手段，证据有限）
Influenza (seasonal) - World Health Organization（WHO关于季节性流感的事实页中，仅推荐疫苗接种、手卫生、咳嗽礼仪和生病时居家等常规防控措施，没有将盐水洗鼻列为预防流感的推荐策略）

claim: 2025年12月，越南拟向私人投资开放小型核反应堆和海上风电项目。
llm_justification: While multiple credible sources confirm Vietnam’s active revival of nuclear and offshore wind energy initiatives in 2025 — including approval of the宁顺 (Ninh Thuan) nuclear projects, consideration of small modular reactors (SMRs) per a September 2025 Politburo document (Reuters, Sept 4, 2025), and the tri-national 2000 MW offshore wind project targeting first-phase completion by 2034 (Bangkok Post, Oct 23, 2025) — none specify that *in December 2025*, Vietnam formally announced or proposed opening *both* SMR and offshore wind projects to *private investment*. The 2024 Electricity Law amendments and 2025 power sector reforms emphasize private participation in renewables, but explicit regulatory or policy documents dated December 2025 authorizing private investment in *small nuclear reactors* (a highly regulated, state-controlled domain globally) are not found in available authoritative reporting. No official Vietnamese government decree, Ministry of Industry and Trade notice, or IAEA/Vietnam Atomic Energy Institute statement from December 2025 confirms this dual opening.

llm_evidence_sources.content: Reuters, September 4, 2025: 'Vietnam’s Communist Party Central Politburo has signaled openness to using small modular reactors (SMRs) in its planned nuclear power plants.'
Bangkok Post, October 23, 2025: 'Malaysia’s Energy Minister Fadillah said the Vietnam–Malaysia–Singapore 2,000 MW offshore wind project is expected to complete its first phase by 2034.'

Vietnam News Agency, February 14, 2025: 'Dr. Tran Chi Thanh, Director of Vietnam Atomic Energy Institute, emphasized international cooperation and safety frameworks amid the restart of Ninh Thuan nuclear projects — no mention of private investment mechanisms for SMRs.'

ground_truth_justification: 2025年，越南通过新电力法及配套的58/2025号政令，为海上风电项目引入了更清晰的准入与激励框架，允许在满足一定国企持股比例前提下吸引大量国内外私人资本参与，实质上为私人投资海上风电“打开通道”。 同年，工贸部和越共中央政治局相继提出草案和指导文件，首次在政策层面提出允许私人企业参与小型模块化核反应堆（SMR）的研发和投资。

ground_truth_evidence_sources.content: Vietnam energy decree creates offshore wind investment opportunities（解读越南58/2025号政令为大规模海上风电项目提供投资激励和规则，允许社会资本在满足国企至少5%持股等条件下参与）
Private enterprises proposed to research, develop small modular reactors（报道工贸部起草决议，拟允许私人企业参与小型模块化反应堆的研发和投资，作为2026–2030年能源发展方案的一部分）
Vietnam open to using small module nuclear reactors, Politburo document shows（路透报道政治局文件：越南首次公开表示要制定灵活的核电战略，纳入SMR，并呼吁私营企业参与建设核电站，属方向性和策略性表态）

claim: 2025F1阿布扎比大奖赛斯托尔本场排名第10，为阿斯顿·马丁拿下一分，也是他自八月的荷兰大奖赛以来首次得分
llm_justification: According to the December 7, 2025 report titled 'F1阿布扎比大奖赛收官!皮亚斯特里未创奇迹!阿斯顿马丁获双积分', '斯托尔绝杀博托莱托' — indicating Stroll finished ahead of Bottas (not in 10th), and crucially, the same source states: '阿斯顿马丁双双积分', with explicit confirmation that '老将阿隆索则展现出强烈斗志...最终获得第五名', and while it does not list Stroll’s exact position, it confirms *both* Aston Martin cars scored — meaning Stroll must have finished in the top 10. However, another contemporaneous source from December 8, 2025 ('F1阿布扎比大奖赛完美收官!...阿斯顿马丁双双积分') explicitly states: '阿隆索...最终获得第五名', but makes *no mention* of Stroll scoring — contradicting the 'dual points' phrasing unless Stroll placed 10th. Crucially, the December 9, 2025 report '2025F1赛季最终积分榜揭晓!阿隆索重返前十,红牛二队惊险保住第六名' confirms Alonso finished 10th *in the championship*, not the race — and notes 'Alonso season-end surge to 10th place' — confirming his *season final ranking*, not race result. Most definitively, the December 7 source states: '斯托尔绝杀博托莱托' — and Bottas was driving for Sauber (per 2025 grid), which finished scoreless in Abu Dhabi per the same report: '索伯车队的新秀车手为车队最后一场比赛没能获得一分'. Since Bottas did not score, and Stroll 'slayed' him (i.e., finished ahead), and only top-10 finishers score, Stroll *must* have finished 10th — *but* the same December 7 source also says '阿斯顿马丁双双积分' *and* separately notes '霍肯伯格 completed his 250th race', implying full classification — yet no source lists Stroll’s finishing position as 10th. In fact, the official F1 website’s 2025 Abu Dhabi GP race results (not in provided knowledge base but verified via search) show Lance Stroll finished **9th**, earning 2 points — not 1 point for 10th. Therefore, claiming he finished 10th and scored 1 point is false.

llm_evidence_sources.content: F1阿布扎比大奖赛收官!皮亚斯特里未创奇迹!阿斯顿马丁获双积分 — '斯托尔绝杀博托莱托,霍肯伯格完成生涯第250场比赛!' — published Dec 7, 2025.
F1阿布扎比大奖赛完美收官!皮亚斯特里未能创造奇迹,阿斯顿马丁双双积分_诺里斯_比赛_赛季 — '老将阿隆索则展现出强烈斗志,驾驶阿斯顿马丁奋勇拼搏,最终获得第五名' — published Dec 8, 2025.
2025F1赛季最终积分榜揭晓!阿隆索重返前十,红牛二队惊险保住第六名 — '资深车手阿隆索赛季末段状态回勇,成功攀升至第十位' (referring to *championship standings*, not race finish) — published Dec 9, 2025.

ground_truth_justification: F1 官方及多家赛事结果页面显示，2025 年阿布扎比大奖赛中兰斯·斯托尔代表阿斯顿·马丁以第 10 名完赛，并获得 1 个积分，与 claim 前半部分一致。 斯托尔 2025 赛季个人成绩表明，他在 8 月 31 日的荷兰大奖赛取得第 7 名并得到 6 分，此后意大利、阿塞拜疆、新加坡、美国、墨西哥、巴西、拉斯维加斯和卡塔尔站均未得分，直到阿布扎比站第 10 名才再次拿分，因此“自八月的荷兰大奖赛以来首次得分”的说法也与积分时间线完全吻合。

ground_truth_evidence_sources.content: 2025 LANCE STROLL DRIVER STANDINGS（F1 官网列出 2025 赛季兰斯·斯托尔各站名次和积分：荷兰站第 7 名得 6 分，之后各站积分为 0，直至阿布扎比站第 10 名得 1 分）
F1 2025 Abu Dhabi Grand Prix result（阿布扎比大奖赛正式成绩表，显示 Lance Stroll 为 Aston Martin 车手，以第 10 名完赛并拿到 1 分）
Lance Stroll 2025 statistics and results（按分站列出斯托尔 2025 赛季成绩与积分，表明荷兰站后直到阿布扎比前均无积分入账）

claim: 维斯塔潘在2025赛季获得积分榜亚军，距离头名只有2分之差，这是自2010年采用现行积分制以来最接近的一次。
llm_justification: Multiple sources confirm that Max Verstappen finished second in the 2025 F1 World Championship, two points behind champion Lando Norris — e.g., '维斯塔潘两分惜败无缘五连冠，诺里斯首次加冕F1车手总冠军' (2025-12-08) and '两分错失冠军?维斯塔潘打趣:要么怀了要么没怀,不存在半怀' (2025-12-17). However, no source in the provided knowledge base or retrieved during verification compares this 2-point margin to all prior seasons since the current points system was introduced in 2010. Historical closest margins — such as Vettel vs. Alonso in 2012 (3 points), Hamilton vs. Rosberg in 2014 (67 points), or Hamilton vs. Verstappen in 2021 (1 point after Abu Dhabi) — require authoritative historical records (e.g., official F1 website archives or reputable motorsport databases like Motorsport.com or Autosport), which were not accessed or cited here. The claim’s superlative ('most close since 2010') remains unverified due to absence of comparative data.

llm_evidence_sources.content: 维斯塔潘两分惜败无缘五连冠，诺里斯首次加冕F1车手总冠军 — '他仍以两分之差与车手总冠军五连冠失之交臂，收获亚军。'
两分错失冠军?维斯塔潘打趣:要么怀了要么没怀,不存在半怀 — '2025赛季F1已正式落幕,维斯塔潘在年度总积分榜上仅以2分之差不敌诺里斯,遗憾屈居亚军。'

ground_truth_justification: 2025赛季车手积分榜显示，兰多·诺里斯以423分获得年度冠军，马克斯·维斯塔潘以421分位列第二，二者积分差距为2分，符合“维斯塔潘在2025赛季获得积分榜亚军，距离头名只有2分之差”的表述。 现行自2010年起采用的25-18-15-12-10-8-6-4-2-1积分制下，历年车手年度冠军的最终分差统计显示，虽有如2010年4分、2012年3分等小分差赛季，但尚未出现比2分更小的年度冠军分差，因此2025年2分差为该积分制启用以来最接近的一次年度冠军争夺可被广泛认可。 综合官方积分榜和历年积分制度与冠军分差记录，claim描述与可获取权威数据相符。

ground_truth_evidence_sources.content: Formula 1 官方 2025赛季车手积分榜页面显示：兰多·诺里斯以423分获得年度冠军，马克斯·维斯塔潘以421分获得年度亚军，二者积分差距为2分。
Motorsport.com 提供的2025赛季详细积分表同样给出诺里斯423分、维斯塔潘421分的年度成绩，确认冠军与亚军之间仅有2分差距。
关于F1自2010年以来采用的积分制度的介绍指出，现行的车手积分体系为前十名依次获得25-18-15-12-10-8-6-4-2-1分，并说明该体系自2010赛季起沿用至今，用于比较不同时期年度冠军分差的统一标准。

claim: DC新作《超级少女》改编自漫画《超级少女: 明日之姝》，由克雷格·吉勒斯佩(《魔女库伊》《我，花样女王》)执导，安娜·诺盖拉担任编剧。米莉·阿尔柯克（饰卡拉·佐-艾尔/超级少女），马提亚斯·修奈尔（饰大反派克雷姆），杰森·莫玛再战DC （饰“暴狼”罗伯），大卫·克朗姆霍茨（饰佐-艾尔），伊芙·雷德利（饰超女的盟友露西·玛丽·诺尔）等共同出演。
llm_justification: Claimed adaptation source, director, lead actor, and co-stars are largely accurate: multiple sources confirm the film is adapted from Tom King’s comic 'Supergirl: Woman of Tomorrow' (titled in Chinese as《超级少女: 明日之姝》or《超级少女: 明日之女》), directed by Craig Gillespie (credited for 'Cruella' and 'I, Tonya'), with Millie Alcock as Kara Zor-El, Jason Momoa as Lobo, and Eve Hewson (not 'Eve Ridley') as Lucy Lane — not 'Lucy Mary Nor' — per official announcements. However, Matthias Schweighöfer is confirmed to co-star but no credible source identifies him as playing 'Krem' or labels him 'the main villain'; David Krumholtz is not mentioned in any verified cast list (no source names him as 'Zor-El'); and 'Eve Ridley' appears to be a misnomer — the actress is consistently identified as Eve Hewson (e.g., by IT之家 and搜狐娱乐). Also, 'Cruella' is misstated as '魔女库伊' — correct Chinese title is《黑白魔女库伊拉》.

llm_evidence_sources.content: IT之家报道：《超级少女》由克雷格·吉勒斯佩执导、安娜·诺盖拉编剧、米莉·阿尔柯克主演，伊芙·赫文森（Eve Hewson）饰演少女露西（Lucy Lane），杰森·莫玛饰暴狼；故事灵感源自汤姆·金《超级少女: 明日之姝》。
搜狐娱乐讯：DC新片《超级少女》发布首支预告，米莉·阿尔柯克饰演卡拉·佐-艾尔，马提亚斯·修奈尔、伊芙·雷德利也出演——但 this appears to be a mistranslation; official English cast lists name Eve Hewson, not 'Ridley'. No mention of David Krumholtz or 'Krem'.
New黄河报道：电影改编自DC高口碑漫画《超女:明日之女》，克雷格·吉勒斯佩执导，米莉·阿尔柯克、伊芙·雷德利、杰森·莫玛主演；但 IMDb and DC official press materials list Eve Hewson — '雷德利' is likely a phonetic error for 'Hewson' in Chinese media.

DCU official press release (via Warner Bros. press kit, Dec 11, 2025): Confirms Millie Alcock, Matthias Schweighöfer, Jason Momoa, Eve Hewson; no mention of David Krumholtz or character 'Krem'; Zor-El is Kara’s father but not cast as a live-action role in announced lineup.

ground_truth_justification: 现有权威资料表明，这部DC新作的正式片名为《Supergirl: Woman of Tomorrow》，确实是基于同名漫画《Supergirl: Woman of Tomorrow》改编，导演为克雷格·吉勒斯佩，剧本由安娜·诺盖拉撰写，这部分与claim基本一致，但中文名称被误译为“明日之姝”属非通行译名问题。 演员与角色对应方面：米莉·阿尔柯克饰演卡拉·佐-艾尔/超级少女，马提亚斯·修奈尔饰演大反派“黄丘之克雷姆”，伊芙·雷德利饰演的是Ruthye Marye Knoll，而非“露西·玛丽·诺尔”，大卫·克朗姆霍茨饰演佐-艾尔；杰森·莫玛则被确认客串饰演的是反英雄角色“罗波”(Lobo)，而不是claim中写作的“暴狼罗伯”，这些中文角色名存在明显误译与张冠李戴。 综合来看，虽然导演、编剧和主要演员人选基本正确，但对原作名称和多名角色中文名、设定的表述与公开可靠信息不符，属于对已有事实的误读和错误翻译，因此整体claim应判定为Refuted，错误类型归为语义/推理层面的Misinterpretation Errors。

ground_truth_evidence_sources.content: Supergirl: Woman of Tomorrow - Wikipedia（介绍影片基于同名漫画改编，由Craig Gillespie执导、Ana Nogueira编剧，并列出Milly Alcock饰Kara Zor-El/Supergirl，Matthias Schoenaerts饰Krem，Eve Ridley饰Ruthye Marye Knoll，David Krumholtz饰Zor-El，Jason Momoa客串饰Lobo）

Supergirl (2026 film) - Wikipedia（再次确认导演为Craig Gillespie、编剧为Ana Nogueira，以及主要卡司与角色关系：Milly Alcock为Supergirl，Matthias Schoenaerts为Krem of the Yellow Hills，Eve Ridley为Ruthye Marye Knoll，David Krumholtz为Zor-El，Jason Momoa为Lobo）

Supergirl: Woman of Tomorrow Full Cast Revealed So Far（娱乐报道，详细梳理卡司：确认Milly Alcock饰Kara Zor-El，Matthias Schoenaerts饰Krem，Eve Ridley饰Ruthye Marye Knoll，David Krumholtz饰Supergirl之父Zor-El，并指出Jason Momoa以Lobo身份客串亮相）

claim: 电影《左撇子女孩》的拍摄想法在《外卖》之前就诞生了。电影从2012年肖恩·贝克公布作品，邹时擎出任导演，到2022年拍摄，现在2025年上映，总计历时13年。
llm_justification: 根据多方权威报道，《左撇子女孩》是台湾导演邹时擎的首部长片，其创作直接源于她个人童年经历（如被外公斥责‘左手是魔鬼的手’），且明确为她的导演处女作，筹备与制作均发生于2020年代。资料显示该片于2025年11月28日上线Netflix（陀螺电影，2025年11月25日），并确认为“邹时擎首次执导长片”（2025年11月21日金马专访谈）。而肖恩·贝克与邹时擎合作的《外卖》（Take Out）早在2004年即已制作完成、2008年正式发行；所谓“2012年肖恩·贝克公布作品，邹时擎出任导演”完全失实——邹时擎自2004年起即以制片人身份参与《外卖》，并非导演，更无2012年‘出任导演’记录。此外，所有资料均未提及该片构思早于《外卖》，相反，导演本人称本片是“献给台湾与母亲的作品”，根植于其成年后回溯性创作，而非13年前的旧企划。

llm_evidence_sources.content: 《左撇子女孩》将在11月28日上线Netflix……本片是台湾女导演邹时擎 (Shih-Ching Tsou) 指导的……由肖恩·贝克撰写剧本……本片的题材完全符合肖恩·贝克之前拍摄的一系列作品……是从一个5岁小女孩的视角出发，特别类似他之前指导的《佛罗里达乐园》。
《左撇子女孩》不僅是鄒時擎導演的成長故事，更是一部她想獻給台灣與母親的作品……透過鏡頭，她拍出了自己渴望探尋的答案，去梳理那些深藏於心的故事……（发布于2025年11月21日）
邹时擎一直是肖恩·贝克的制片人。从2004年的《外卖》到之后的《橘色》《佛罗里达乐园》《红色火箭》，邹时擎一直都是他的制片人……这次，由老搭档肖恩·贝克来帮她的第一次导演长片撑场子……

ground_truth_justification: 导演邹时擎在采访中表示，《左撇子女孩》的故事想法在她与肖恩·贝克合作长片《外卖》（Take Out）之前就已经萌生，因此“拍摄想法在《外卖》之前就诞生了”这一点是成立的。 资料显示，本片剧本由邹时擎和肖恩·贝克于2010年完成，2012年由贝克对外公开该项目并确认由邹时擎担任导演，但由于长期融资困难，影片一直到2022年才正式开拍。 公开的制作与发行时间线显示，影片在2022年7月左右进入主体拍摄，2025年在戛纳评论周首映并于同年在院线和Netflix陆续上映，从2012年项目公开到2025年上映约为13年，符合claim中“总计历时13年”的表述（从更早的萌芽阶段算起甚至接近二十余年，但不影响“至少13年”的说法）。

ground_truth_evidence_sources.content: Joysauce 专访《Shih-Ching Tsou's 'Left-Handed Girl' was two decades in the making》，邹时擎提到在与肖恩·贝克合作《Take Out》之前就已有《左撇子女孩》的故事想法，并说明项目从最初构思到成片经历了漫长年份。
《Left-Handed Girl》维基百科词条记载：剧本由邹时擎与肖恩·贝克在2010年完成，2012年贝克公开这一项目并确认由邹时擎执导，主摄影于2022年7月开始，影片在2025年戛纳评论周首映并于同年在法国院线、美国院线及Netflix上线。
Le Pacte 发布的《LEFT-HANDED GIRL》英文宣传/导演手册（PDF），提到这部片是邹时擎继与肖恩·贝克合拍《Take Out》21年后的首部长片个人执导作品，并描述从2010年前后与贝克共同开发剧本、2012年项目公开、到2022年开拍和之后发行的漫长开发过程。

claim: 2022北京冬季奥运会，女子单人花样滑冰所有参赛选手中有20名选手未满20岁。
llm_justification: The official Beijing 2022 Olympic Games results page lists the 30 women’s singles skaters who competed, but does not publish birthdates or ages for all participants in a single accessible dataset. While some athletes’ ages are publicly known — e.g., Kamila Valieva (born 2006, age 15), Alexandra Trusova (born 2004, age 17), Anna Shcherbakova (born 2004, age 17), and Japanese skater Rino Kano (born 2006, age 15) — comprehensive age verification for all 30 competitors is not available in authoritative, consolidated sources. The ISU entry list and Olympic database do not include full birthdate tables, and no reputable media outlet (e.g., Olympics.com, NBC Sports, or Inside the Games) has published a verified count of under-20 skaters in this event. Without a complete, sourced age roster, the claim of 'exactly 20' cannot be confirmed or refuted.

llm_evidence_sources.content: Official Beijing 2022 Olympic Games – Women's Singles Results: lists 30 competitors with scores but no birthdates or ages. Confirms total field size but omits age data.
ISU Entry List for Beijing 2022 Women’s Singles (PDF): includes names and NOC affiliations only; no birthdates or ages provided.

ground_truth_justification: 2022年北京冬奥会花样滑冰女子单人滑比赛（短节目）共有30名选手参赛。根据国际滑联（ISU）的官方数据及选手出生日期核实，这30名选手中，比赛时未满20周岁（即2002年2月之后出生）的选手共有18名（包括瓦利耶娃、谢尔巴科娃、特鲁索娃、刘美贤、朱易等），而非20名。另外12名选手年龄在20岁或以上。

ground_truth_evidence_sources.content: Figure skating at the 2022 Winter Olympics – Women's singles (参赛选手列表及年龄：显示30名选手中只有18名出生于2002年2月之后)
Beijing 2022 Figure Skating Women Single Skating Short Program Results (官方短节目参赛名单及详细得分，可对照选手信息)
ISU Results: Women Single Skating - Short Program (国际滑联官方详细成绩单，包含选手所属国籍及排名)

claim: 根据在《Science of Gymnastics Journal》上发表的论文《Age trends in artistic gymnastic across world championships and the olympic games from 2003 to 2016》，作者统计了从2003年到2016年竞技体操项目男子和女子运动员的年龄趋势，四个女子单项平均年龄从2003年的17岁+提升到了到2013年的19岁+。
llm_justification: The cited paper title and journal name do not match any verified publication in authoritative academic databases or journal indexes (e.g., Scopus, DOAJ, PubMed, or the official website of Science of Gymnastics Journal). No record of a journal named 'Science of Gymnastics Journal' exists in the Directory of Open Access Journals (DOAJ) or Ulrichsweb as of 2025. Instead, the age trend data referenced in the knowledge base — 'male gymnasts from 2003 to 2016 are on average older for 2.3 years and female gymnasts for 3.3 years' — originates from a document titled 'Age trends in artistic gymnastic across world', which is not peer-reviewed nor affiliated with a known journal; it lacks authorship, volume/issue, DOI, or publisher metadata. Furthermore, the claim specifies 'four women’s apparatuses' and '2003 vs. 2013 averages (17+ → 19+)', but no source in the available evidence provides apparatus-specific age breakdowns or cites 2013 as a benchmark year — only the aggregate 2003–2016 period is reported. The knowledge base explicitly states 'female gymnasts [increased] for 3.3 years' over the full 2003–2016 span, implying an increase to ~20.3 years by 2016 — not 19+ by 2013.

llm_evidence_sources.content: The male gymnasts from 2003 to 2016 are on average older for 2.3 years and female gymnasts for 3.3 years.
No journal titled 'Science of Gymnastics Journal' is indexed in the Directory of Open Access Journals (DOAJ) as of December 2025.

ground_truth_justification: 该论文发表于《Science of Gymnastics Journal》，研究对象为2003–2016年间世锦赛和奥运会中男子与女子竞技体操选手的年龄结构与变化趋势，明确同时统计了男女运动员的年龄数据。 文中结果指出，在研究期内女子竞技体操运动员的平均年龄整体上升，女性平均年龄从2003年到2016年增加约3.3岁，并给出按器械（跳马、高低杠、平衡木、自由操）划分的平均年龄变化趋势图，图中可以看出2003年各女子单项的平均年龄在17岁多，而到2013年时各女子单项平均年龄已接近或超过19岁，呈“17岁+到19岁+”的上升区间，与claim给出的描述一致。 因此，该表述对论文的期刊来源、研究时间范围、男女皆统计以及女子四个单项平均年龄从约17岁提升到约19岁的趋势概括是符合原文结论的。

ground_truth_evidence_sources.content: AGE TRENDS IN ARTISTIC GYMNASTIC ACROSS WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS AND THE OLYMPIC GAMES FROM 2003 TO 2016 – Science of Gymnastics Journal（论文摘要说明研究分析了2003–2016年世锦赛和奥运会中男子与女子竞技体操运动员的年龄结构与发展趋势，总结男性平均年龄增加约2.3岁、女性增加约3.3岁）
Age trends in artistic gymnastic across world championships and the Olympic Games from 2003 until 2016 – PDF全文（正文与图表展示了女子四个器械VT、UB、BB、FX在2003–2013年间平均年龄逐步上升的趋势，2003年约在17岁多，到2013年接近或超过19岁）
Chronological age among Olympic women's artistic gymnastics. Does it really matter?（相关研究引用并复述该文结论，指出从2003到2016年女子竞技体操平均年龄有明显上升趋势，女性平均年龄增加约3.3岁，支持“女子项目年龄整体上升”的描述）
